title: Process Title and Registration Paperwork
description: A dealership's back-office staff needs to process the title application and registration for a recently sold vehicle.

tasks.description: Retrieve the signed bill of sale and power of attorney documents for the vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all necessary legal documents.

tasks.description: Complete the official state DMV forms for title application and registration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately fills out all required government forms.

tasks.description: Submit the paperwork and associated fees to the local DMV.
tasks.expected_outcome: The paperwork is successfully submitted for processing.
